Social / Foundation / 04 Foundation Grants
A2M4Tech
Associate to Master’s degree Pathway for Technology (A2M4Tech) is a new 
development program run by Northeastern University. A2M4Tech addresses institutional barriers that have long slowed progress in achieving equity in computer science. The program combines academic study with work by providing full-time employment opportunities for students while they pursue their degrees. 
In 2021, the Akamai Foundation was able to provide A2M4Tech with a 
founding grant. In 2022, we continued to support them and help build out aspects of the program, with the first cohort enrolling in September 2022.
Student at Northeastern University - Photo provided by Joseph Harari, Success 
Coach at A2M4Tech
The Akamai scholarship is an investment in my future education and 
my dream of chasing a better life for myself, my family, and society as I aspire to become a cybersecurity professional. [...] (A2M4Tech’s) guidance and mentorship have been invaluable and have played a significant role in shaping my career and academic success. Once again, I thank you from the bottom of my heart for your investment in me and your thoughtful scholarship. Without your kind generosity, it wouldn’t be possible to make my dream a reality.
Anonymous
